review: I bought the Chromecast so that I could stream Netflix to my bedroom tv without spending much on a device. I love that it is so small and is powered by the tv itself; this makes it great for a mounted tv. It does exactly what it says it will: streams video.Cons: you have to use a phone, tablet or laptop to control the device. There is a delay when you find a tv episode or movie to watch in an app to have it start on the Chromecast. The initial setup was a little complicated even for someone who has set up many similar devices.All in all, I would recommend Chromecast for casual use because it gives you streaming functionality at a very low price. However, if you're looking for a device for frequent use, I prefer something with its own remote so you can scroll through content on the streaming device itself rather than relying on your tablet or phone's app to start playing video.
